sentence.Network_en: Thereupon, we knew, our endeavor was valuable.

sentences.en: He endeavored after more fame and wealth.
sentences.cn: 他力图获得更大的名声和更多的财富。

sentences.en: They endeavored to make her happy, but in vain.
sentences.cn: 他们想方设法地使她高兴, 但那是徒劳的。

sentences.en: He is earnest in his endeavors.
Shop assistants should do their best endeavors to give the customers satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 店员应该尽力使顾客满意。
